author: Sabine Hossenfelder
description:
Learn more about physics with Brilliant! Get your first 30 days free as well as 20% off an annual premium subscription when you use my link ➜ https://brilliant.org/sabine.

A lot of people have asked for my advice regarding pursuing a career in physics recently. Here are my general feelings about working in the field.

title: So You Want to Be a Physicist? Watch This First
